statements: UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 100 WHERE post_id = 1
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET comments = 50, shares = 20 WHERE post_id = 2
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE post_id = 12345;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET shares = 75, likes = 120, comments = 60 WHERE post_id = 54321;
UPDATE posts SET likes=10, comments=5 WHERE post_id=1;
UPDATE post_engagement SET comments=20, shares=15 WHERE post_id=2;
UPDATE posts SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE post_engagement SET comments = 20, engagement_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE engagement_id = 1;

UPDATE comments SET comment_text = 'Updated comment text', comment_timestamp = '2022-01-02 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = '43218765-1234-5678-1234-567812345678' AND post_id = '345e6789-e89b-34c5-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE posts SET post_text = 'Updated Post Text' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE likes SET like_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE likes SET like_timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE post_id = 123 AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE posts SET num_likes = num_likes + 1, num_comments = num_comments - 1 WHERE post_id = 789;
UPDATE post_likes SET like_timestamp = '2022-04-25 10:30:00' WHERE post_id = 1234 AND user_id = 5678;
UPDATE post_shares SET user_id = 9876, share_timestamp = '2022-04-26 15:45:00' WHERE post_id = 5678;
UPDATE post_likes SET like_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = 1 AND user_id = 101
UPDATE post_performance SET total_engagement = 500, performance_rank = 1 WHERE post_id = 4
